Load data from connection

load_dataset.Rd

Load data from connection. Function used on DatasetConnector and Dataset to obtain data from connection.

load_dataset(x, ...)

# S3 method for Dataset
load_dataset(x, ...)

# S3 method for DatasetConnector
load_dataset(x, args = NULL, try = FALSE, conn = NULL, ...)

Arguments

x

(DatasetConnector or Dataset)
...

not used, only for support of S3
args

(NULL or named list)
additional dynamic arguments passed to function which loads the data.
try

(logical) whether perform function evaluation inside try clause
conn

Optional (DataConnection) object required to pull the data.

Value

x with loaded dataset object

Examples


# Dataset --------
library(random.cdisc.data)
ADSL <- radsl(cached = TRUE)
ADSL_dataset <- dataset("ADSL", x = ADSL)

load_dataset(ADSL_dataset)

# DatasetConnector --------
library(random.cdisc.data)
adsl <- rcd_cdisc_dataset_connector("ADSL", fun = radsl, cached = FALSE)
load_dataset(adsl)
get_dataset(adsl)

adae <- rcd_cdisc_dataset_connector("ADAE", fun = radae, ADSL = adsl, max_n_aes = 2L)
load_dataset(adae)
